compress_messages.description: Whether or not to try to compress messages

friend_address.description: Default LoRa address to send to

power_level.description: Transmission power level, low to high power

enable_rate_filter.description: Whether or not to impose maximum update rate

min_filter_delay.description: Minimum update delay, if enable_rate_filter enabled

type.description: Which version of the OLED is being used

reset_pin.description: Which pin should be used for reseting. Only applies to breakout version

display_format.description: How to display the key value pairs of a bundle

scroll_duration.description: The time (ms) to complete full scroll cycle if display_format is SCROLL

freeze_pin.description: Which pin should be used to pause the display

freeze_behavior.description: How freezing the display should behave
